subject: Re: [junit] Test coverage metrics reporting tool
msgSnippet: ... That was my idea but even with parsing the source code, you face some difficult problems with comments.   Did someone already found a solution for a
messageBody:
> Without parsing the source code there is no way to know.

That was my idea but even with parsing the source code, you face some
difficult problems with comments. Did someone already found a solution
for a "clean" parsing? (maybe parsing the class files)

-Vlad
